Package jinngine.physics

Interface Summary
Constraint  
ContactGeneratorClassifier A ContactGeneratorClassifier is used by the model to map between pairs of interfering geometries, and suited ContactGenerator instances, used by the ContactConstraint.
Force  
JointAxisController  
Model An interface to a physical simulation.
Solver Solver for a velocity-based, linear complimentarity problem (VBLCP).
 

Class Summary
Body Abstract class representing a rigid body.
Box A box implementation
CompositeBody Composite body is a way of constructing a rigid body as a composition of a number of other bodies.
ConstraintEntry A linear constraint definition involving two bodies.
ConstraintListIterator  
Ellipsoid Ellipsoid implementation.
Engine A fixed time stepping rigid body simulator.
ProjectedGaussSeidel Implementation of the PGS solver.
Sphere A Sphere implementation.
State Physical state structure for a rigid body.
UniversalJoint Interface to joint types in jinngine.
